mapper.sql: ID, GOODS_TYPE_ID, GOODS_TYPE_CODE, PRODUCT_ID,PRODUCT_CODE, DEPT_REGION_ID, ARRV_REGION_ID, SALES_CHANNEL_CODE, SALES_CHANNEL_ID, PRICING_ENTRY_ID, PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, PRICE_PLAN_ID, PRICE_PLAN_CODE, MARKETING_EVENT_ID, MARKETING_EVENT_CODE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_NO, ACTIVE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, LONG_OR_SHORT, TYPE, CURRENCY_CODE, CODE, NAME, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFY_USER, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, PRICING_INDUSTRY_ID, PRICING_INDUSTRY_CODE

MASTER.ID AS ID , MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_ID AS GOODS_TYPE_ID , MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_CODE AS GOODS_TYPE_CODE , MASTER.PRODUCT_ID AS PRODUCT_ID , MASTER.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE , MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID AS DEPT_REGION_ID , MASTER.ARRV_REGION_ID AS ARRV_REGION_ID , MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_CODE AS SALES_CHANNEL_CODE , MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_ID AS SALES_CHANNEL_ID , MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_ID AS PRICING_ENTRY_ID , MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE AS PRICING_ENTRY_CODE , MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_ID AS PRICE_PLAN_ID , MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_CODE AS PRICE_PLAN_CODE , MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_ID AS MARKETING_EVENT_ID , MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_CODE AS MARKETING_EVENT_CODE , MASTER.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION , MASTER.VERSION_NO AS VERSION_NO , MASTER.ACTIVE AS ACTIVE , MASTER.BEGIN_TIME AS BEGIN_TIME , MASTER.END_TIME AS END_TIME , MASTER.LONG_OR_SHORT AS LONG_OR_SHORT , MASTER.TYPE AS TYPE , MASTER.CURRENCY_CODE AS CURRENCY_CODE , MASTER.CODE AS CODE , MASTER.NAME AS NAME , MASTER.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME , MASTER.CREATE_USER_CODE AS CREATE_USER_CODE , MASTER.CREATE_ORG_CODE AS CREATE_ORG_CODE , MASTER.MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME , MASTER.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFYUSER , MASTER.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP AS CENTRALIZE_PICKUP , FLIGHT_SHIFT AS FLIGHT_SHIFT

pla.NAME AS PRICE_PLAN_NAME, pla.ID AS PRICE_PLAN_ID, va.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP AS CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, va.TYPE as VALUATION_TYPE, va.FLIGHT_SHIFT AS FLIGHT_SHIFT, va.CURRENCY_CODE AS CURRENCY_CODE, va.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE AS PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, rl.EXPRESSION AS EXPRESSION, detail.id AS PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL_ID, detail.CACULATE_TYPE AS CACULATE_TYPE, detail.FEE_RATE AS FEE_RATE, detail.LEFTRANGE AS LEFTRANGE, detail.RIGHTRANGE AS RIGHTRANGE, detail.MIN_FEE AS MIN_FEE, detail.MAX_FEE AS MAX_FEE, detail.PARM1 AS PARM1, detail.PARM2 AS PARM2, detail.PARM3 AS PARM3, detail.PARM4 AS PARM4, detail.PARM5 AS PARM5

rule.NAME AS PRICE_RULE_NAME, rule.CODE AS PRICE_RULE_CODE, rule.EXPRESSION AS EXPRESSION,
va.DEPT_REGION_ID AS DEPT_REGION_ID, va.ARRV_REGION_ID AS ARRV_REGION_ID, va.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP AS CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, va.TYPE as VALUATION_TYPE, va.FLIGHT_SHIFT AS FLIGHT_SHIFT, va.CURRENCY_CODE AS CURRENCY_CODE, va.PRODUCT_CODE AS PRODUCT_CODE, va.GOODS_TYPE_CODE AS GOODS_TYPE_CODE, va.LONG_OR_SHORT AS LONG_OR_SHORT, va.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE AS PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, entry.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, detail.id AS PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL_ID, detail.CACULATE_TYPE AS CACULATE_TYPE, detail.FEE_RATE AS FEE_RATE, detail.FEE AS FEE, detail.DISCOUNT_RATE AS DISCOUNT_RATE, detail.LEFTRANGE AS LEFTRANGE, detail.RIGHTRANGE AS RIGHTRANGE, detail.MIN_FEE AS MIN_FEE, detail.MAX_FEE AS MAX_FEE, detail.CANDELETE, detail.CANMODIFY AS CANMODIFY, detail.SUB_TYPE, detail.PARM1 AS PARM1, detail.PARM2 AS PARM2, detail.PARM3 AS PARM3, detail.PARM4 AS PARM4, detail.PARM5 AS PARM5, detail.MIN_FEE_RATE AS MIN_FEE_RATE, detail.MAX_FEE_RATE AS MAX_FEE_RATE
mapper.select:
SELECT /* 综合-价格-根据名称查询计费规则*/
FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION MASTER
UPPER(TRIM(MASTER.NAME)) = UPPER(TRIM(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND MASTER.TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY MASTER.MODIFY_TIME DESC

select MASTER.ID, MASTER.NAME, MASTER.CACULATE_TYPE, MASTER.FEE, FEE_RATE, MASTER.LEFTRANGE, MASTER.RIGHTRANGE, MASTER.MIN_FEE, MASTER.MAX_FEE, MASTER.SUB_TYPE, MASTER.CANMODIFY, MASTER.CANDELETE, MASTER.DESCRIPTION, MASTER.PROCESS_PROGRAM, MASTER.PROCESS_PARM_VAL, MASTER.PRICING_CRITERIA_ID, MASTER.T_SRV_PRICE_RULE_ID, MASTER.PARM2, MASTER.PARM1, MASTER.PARM3, MASTER.PARM4, MASTER.PARM5, MASTER.DISCOUNT_RATE, MASTER.ACTIVE, MASTER.VERSION_NO, MASTER.PRICING_VALUATION_ID, MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID from PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_CRITERIA_DETAIL MASTER WHERE MASTER.pricing_valuation_id =#{priceValuationId}
mapper.insert:
insert into PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION
ID,
GOODS_TYPE_ID,
GOODS_TYPE_CODE,
PRODUCT_ID,
PRODUCT_CODE,
DEPT_REGION_ID,
ARRV_REGION_ID,
SALES_CHANNEL_CODE,
SALES_CHANNEL_ID,
PRICING_ENTRY_ID,
PRICING_ENTRY_CODE,
PRICING_INDUSTRY_ID,
PRICING_INDUSTRY_CODE,
PRICE_PLAN_ID,
PRICE_PLAN_CODE,
MARKETING_EVENT_ID,
MARKETING_EVENT_CODE,
DESCRIPTION,
VERSION_NO,
ACTIVE,
BEGIN_TIME,
END_TIME,
LONG_OR_SHORT,
TYPE,
CURRENCY_CODE,
CODE,
NAME,
CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_USER_CODE,
MODIFY_USER_CODE,
CREATE_ORG_CODE,
MODIFY_ORG_CODE,
CENTRALIZE_PICKUP,
FLIGHT_SHIFT
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deptRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{arrvRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salesChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{salesChannelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricingEntryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricingEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricingIndustryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricingIndustryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricePlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pricePlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{marketingEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{marketingEventCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate, sysdate,
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{centralizePickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lightShift,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

INSERT /*综合-价格-复制汽运价格方案 插入计价方案*/ INTO PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION (ID, GOODS_TYPE_ID, GOODS_TYPE_CODE, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, DEPT_REGION_ID, ARRV_REGION_ID, SALES_CHANNEL_CODE, SALES_CHANNEL_ID, PRICING_ENTRY_ID, PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, PRICE_PLAN_ID, PRICE_PLAN_CODE, MARKETING_EVENT_ID, MARKETING_EVENT_CODE, DESCRIPTION, VERSION_NO, ACTIVE, BEGIN_TIME, END_TIME, LONG_OR_SHORT, TYPE, CURRENCY_CODE, CODE, NAME, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, CREATE_ORG_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, MODIFY_ORG_CODE, CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, FLIGHT_SHIFT) SELECT SYS_GUID(), MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_ID, MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_CODE, MASTER.PRODUCT_ID, MASTER.PRODUCT_CODE, MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID, MASTER.ARRV_REGION_ID, MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_CODE, MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_ID, MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_ID, MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_CODE, MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_ID, MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_CODE, MASTER.DESCRIPTION, MASTER.VERSION_NO, MASTER.ACTIVE, MASTER.BEGIN_TIME, MASTER.END_TIME, MASTER.LONG_OR_SHORT, MASTER.TYPE, MASTER.CURRENCY_CODE, MASTER.CODE, MASTER.NAME, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MASTER.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP, MASTER.FLIGHT_SHIFT FROM PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION MASTER WHERE MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_ID = #{pricePlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
mapper.update:
UPDATE /* 综合-价格-修改计费规则 */ PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION MASTER
MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_ID = #{goodsTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.GOODS_TYPE_CODE = #{goodsTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRODUCT_CODE = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.DEPT_REGION_ID = #{deptRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.ARRV_REGION_ID = #{arrvRegionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_CODE = #{salesChannelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.SALES_CHANNEL_ID = #{salesChannelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_ID = #{pricingEntryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICING_ENTRY_CODE = #{pricingEntryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICING_INDUSTRY_ID = #{pricingIndustryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICING_INDUSTRY_CODE = #{pricingIndustryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_ID = #{pricePlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.PRICE_PLAN_CODE = #{pricePlanCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_ID = #{marketingEventId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.MARKETING_EVENT_CODE = #{marketingEventCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.DESCRIPTION = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MASTER.ACTIVE = #{active,jdbcType=CHAR},
MASTER.BEGIN_TIME = #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MASTER.END_TIME = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MASTER.LONG_OR_SHORT = #{longOrShort,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.CURRENCY_CODE = #{currencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.MODIFY_TIME = sysdate,
MASTER.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.MODIFY_ORG_CODE = #{modifyOrgCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.FLIGHT_SHIFT = #{lightShift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MASTER.CENTRALIZE_PICKUP = #{centralizePickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete /* 综合-价格-根据价格方案ID删除相关计费规则信息 */ from PKP.T_SRV_PRICING_VALUATION va WHERE va.PRICE_PLAN_ID = #{pricePlanId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
